summary: Both REQ-25 and REQ-26 appear to be implemented. REQ-25 is addressed in SurvivalGuideSection.tsx with 'Timmy & Ricay's Survival Tips' heading and '— curated by Timmy and Ricay —' byline, preserving all five original tip texts and monospace/typewriter styling. REQ-26 is addressed by the new CodeEntryGate.tsx component with sessionStorage persistence, ACCESS DENIED error state, glitch animation, Backrooms aesthetic styling, and integration in App.tsx. All acceptance criteria appear met based on the diff evidence.
